subject: RE: [junit] Build new junit.jar
msgSnippet: Actually not... because it does not appear to be in the junit 3.7 release... I just checked out 3.8.1 and it does have the build.xml in the src.jar. Not sure
messageBody:
Actually not... because it does not appear to be in the junit 3.7 release...
I just checked out 3.8.1 and it does have the build.xml in the src.jar.
Not sure why it is not in the 3.7?

thanks,
johnj

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Rogers [mailto:jacaetevha@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 18, 2003 7:11 PM
To: JUnit Yahoo Group
Subject: Re: [junit] Build new junit.jar


Is it not enough that the build.xml comes in the src.jar?

On Tue, 18 Feb 2003 17:22:04 -0800, "John Johnson" <johnj@...>
said:
> This message only has an HTML part -- this is a text generated

=jason
